ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, last night I too searched the Mines of Nurga and found nothing. We moved to the Temple of Droga and made a startling discovery.  There is at least one
ygData.messageBody:
Well, last night I too searched the Mines of Nurga and found nothing.
We moved to the Temple of Droga and made a startling discovery. There
is at least one oven and one pottery kiln in the town-like areas or in
the prison areas of Droga. (We didn't get far in, the information came
from a 53 mage who was running around solo). The mage who gave the
information said that he hadn't actually clicked them to see if they
worked, but it looked like they might and he'd check for me and let me
know.

If you've already said too much, does that mean a forage or two near
Kurn's tower where the burynai seem to live would do it?

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~katyw -Advice from the Naked
CS/Comp Math Major, UC Riverside Dancing Llama
